Class SystemManager

java.lang.Object
CZ2002_Assignment.SystemManager
public class SystemManager extends Object
Main controller of the system Collects information from other class and outputs to console application

      public void MakePayment​(int tableIndex)

      Parameters:
      tableIndex - Table number of the order to be paid

    • OccupyFreeTable

      public int OccupyFreeTable​(int numOfPax)
      Occupies a free table based on number of pax Returns the table number that was occuped, if found. Otherwise, returns -1 if there are no free tables A free Table must be both not occupied and not reserved
      Parameters:
      numOfPax - Capacity of Seats
      Returns:
      Table number that was occupied

      public void CheckForTimeOut​(LocalTime currentTime)
      Checks all Reservation Objects in reservationList and times out expired reservations Expired reservations are reservations that exceed the maxTime maxTime = Reservation Time + Max Time Limit
      Parameters:
      currentTime - Current Time of System

    • TimeOptions

      public LocalTime TimeOptions​(LocalTime currentTime)
      Time options for currentTime variable Time can be view or modified Each time the currentTime is modified, CheckForTimeOut() will be triggered.
      Parameters:
      currentTime - Current Time of the System
      Returns:
      the modified time
